description: Source code for the TransactionService class providing methods to manage transactions via REST API, including fetching, creating, updating, and deleting transactions.

classes.name: TransactionService
classes.description: A service class for transaction management with static methods for CRUD operations interacting with backend REST API.

methods.name: fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches all transactions for the authenticated user.

methods.name: createTransaction
methods.description: Creates a new transaction with provided data.

methods.name: updateTransaction
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction identified by ID with new data.
